item.title: Teens love the video app TikTok. Do they love it too much?
item.description: From the perspective of teenagers, TikTok is a predominant original outlet for self-expression, one proudly dwelling to the silly, the loud and the unusual. To others, the Chinese-owned online video provider is an unnerving dusky field that might perchance per chance also very smartly be sharing records with the Chinese govt, facilitating espionage, or appropriate selling videos and songs some other folks take into consideration lewd.
